mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SHOP_COMMENT( com_no comNo, user_id userId, pro_no proNo, com_contents comContents, com_regdate comRegdate, com_depth comDepth, com_seq comSeq ) VALUES ( SHOP_COMMENT_SEQ.nextval, #{userId}, #{proNo}, #{comContents}, TO_DATE(SYSDATE,'yyyy/MM/dd'), #{comDepth}, #{comSeq} )
mapper.select: SELECT A.com_no comNo, B.user_id userId, C.pro_no proNo, A.com_contents comContents, A.com_regdate comRegdate, A.com_depth comDepth, A.com_seq comSeq FROM SHOP_COMMENT A, SHOP_USER B, SHOP_PRODUCT C WHERE A.user_id = B.user_id AND A.pro_no = C.pro_no AND A.pro_no = #{proNo}
